媠字的基本解释

媠
tuó
美好：“形媠服兮扬幽若。”

媠
duò
古同“惰”。

媠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duò］
［《廣韻》徒卧切，去過，定。］
同“惰1”。
懈怠；不庄重。
[②]［tuǒ］
［《廣韻》他果切，上果，透。］
同“嫷1”。亦作“嫷1”。
美好。参见“媠2服”、“媠2媠”。

媠字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　媠； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页267第20
【廣韻】他果切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】吐火切，?音妥。【揚子·方言】豔美也。　又【集韻】吐臥切，音唾。吳楚衡淮之閒謂好曰娃，南楚之外曰媠，故吳有館娃之宮，漆媠之室。【前漢·谷永傳】車馬媠游之具。　又奴臥切，音愞。義同。又努果切。同㛂。　又杜果切，音朶。【說文】不敬也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?徒臥切。與惰同。【前漢·外戚傳】李夫人曰：妾不敢以燕媠見帝。又【龔勝傳】媠嫚亡狀。　【說文】作嫷。今省作媠。

媠字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
媠字的起名意思

美好。

媠
Basic explanation of words
媠
tuó
Wonderful: "The clothes are beautiful and quiet."
媠
duò
Gu Tong is "lazy".
媠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duò］
["Guangyun" cuts only lying down, have been there, set. ]
Same as "Idle 1".
Slack; not solemn.
[②]［tuǒ］
["Guangyun" He cuts, puts on the fruit, and sees through. ]
Same as "嫷1". Also known as "嫷1".
Beautiful. See "Yi 2 Service", "Yi 2".
媠
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　媠; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 267 No. 20
[Guang Yun] He Guoqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Spit the fire and cut it, the sound is correct. [Yangtze Dialect] Yanmei is also beautiful.　 [Ji Yun] Spit lying and cut, sound saliva. Wu Chu Henghuai’s leisure time is called a good baby, and outside the South Chu is called a nest, so Wu has a palace for children and a room with a lacquer. [Previous Han·Gu Yong Chuan] A tool for carriage and horse riding.　Slave and cut again, Yin Ming. The same meaning. No fruit cut again. Same as 㛂.　Du Guoqie again, Yin Duo. [Said Wen] Disrespectful.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Lie and cut. Same with laziness. [Previous Han·Foreign Relations] Mrs. Li said: Concubine dare not see the emperor with Yanyu. Also [Gong Sheng Biography] Yuman died.　【Said the text】Complete. This province is a place of worship.
媠

Old glyph
媠
Name meaning
Beautiful.
tuǒ, duò
прил.
1) duò вм. 惰 (ленивый)
2) tuǒ вм. 嫷 (красивый)
